features.name: Catalog Builder
features.description: Real-time editor for creating and customizing product catalogs with drag-and-drop support.

features.name: Product Management
features.description: CRUD operations for products, including SKU, price, category, and image handling.

features.name: Public Catalog Viewer
features.description: Public-facing view for catalogs with page-flip animation and interactive elements.

features.name: PDF Export
features.description: Generates high-quality PDF versions of the catalogs for offline viewing.

features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: User login, registration, and permission management using Supabase Auth and RLS.

features.name: Multi-language Support
features.description: Translation system for Turkish and English catalogs.
